Counter.help: A single foe is condemned to suffer psychic pain alone. Should the target remain near allies, they will spread their pain to others, causing major damage.

Aura_of_Pain.help: Shalice Tilman's disembodied mind projects a powerful aura that can weaken her enemies to further psionic attacks. This attack also renders enemies affected by it susceptible to the secondary effects of Aura of Psychosis.
Aura_of_Pain.targetHelp: Shalice Tilman's disembodied mind projects a powerful aura that can weaken her enemies to further psionic attacks. This attack also renders enemies affected by it susceptible to the secondary effects of Aura of Psychosis.

Resistance.help: Shalice Tilman has powerful resistance to all status effects. However, she is susceptible to interference which causes this aura to be temporarily disabled.
